about_the_game:
Scuttle Up is a punishing platformer where you play as a depressed-yet-agile crab. Your journey begins in a boring corporate office, and your mission is to escape the 9-5 and ascend to the top of a mysterious island. A prize worthy of a king crab awaits you at the top, but do you have the resolve to make it there?

How To Enjoy:

  • Be a crab. Awesome
  • Grab & throw objects to make it look like you know what you're doing
  • Collect hidden hats, wear them, & look cooler than your friends

Remember:

  • If you can't make it very far, its a skill issue; try getting good
  • You will lose faith in yourself, this game, and all of mankind
  • Prepare to suffer

When you're not falling off the map, you can enjoy the interesting and stylized environment of The Island. There are little secrets hidden throughout, so make sure to look around.

Features:

  • Interesting levels with multiple solutions - Play your way!
  • Fully simulated day/night cycles
  • Dynamic weather effects
  • Unique moveable objects with simulated physics
  • Lovely video game water
  • and more!
